import React from "react"; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Intro.css'; import '../../App.css' import {formatText, projectImg} from '../data/Data.js' function Intro(props) { const projectId = props.component.toString().trim(); return(

{props.title}

{ formatText(props.summary) }

Responsibilities

{ formatText(props.responsibilities) }

Tools

{ formatText(props.tools) }

{props.team === '' ? <> :

Collaborators

{ formatText(props.team) }

}

Timeline

{ props.dates }

) } export default Intro
